FAQ in Paper

  3. A cross-format bibtex bibliography based on sphinxcontrib-bibtex

    注解

    see blow

  4. Tables that can go inside figures

  5. Changed table formatting to look pretty, like booktabs

  6. Improved alignment in table environment

  7. Added support for short captions that show up in the “list of figures” section

    .. label-ref:

  8. Changed equation reference formatting from “(1)” to “1”

  9. Full customization of latex preamble and style file

  10. Numbered figures

  11. Numbered section references

  12. A singletext output that builds into a single text file, similar to singlehtml

  13. A subfigure environment
